snippet: KAYE--Judge Judith. Judith, you were a friend, a colleague and a true inspiration to all of us. You will be sorely missed. Karen and Jay Kasner Brett, Ali, Jared and Jen Kasner 1/3
lead_paragraph: KAYE--Judge Judith. Judith, you were a friend, a colleague and a true inspiration to all of us. You will be sorely missed. Karen and Jay Kasner Brett, Ali, Jared and Jen Kasner 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KAYE, JUDGE JUDITH
